attributes.action: Block Google UK Streetmap Views of individual houses without express permission of owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It gives burglars and trouble makers too much opportunity to survey the security of a street, individual homes and buildings to sift out their potential targets for burglaries or other crimes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
